mapper.select: update project set project_name = #{projectName}, update_time = now() where project_seq = #{projectSeq}
select project_seq from project where team_id in (select team_id from team_member where user_seq = #{userSeq}) and project_seq not in (select project_seq from documents)

select a.*,b.team_category as team_category from project a left outer join team_member b on a.team_id = b.team_id and b.team_leader = 'Y' where a.team_id in (select team_id from team_member where user_seq = #{userSeq})
select a.*,b.user_seq as team_leader_seq,b.team_category as team_category from project a left outer join team_member b on a.team_id = b.team_id and b.team_leader = 'Y'
update project set finish_yn='S' , update_time = now() where project_seq = #{projectSeq}
update project set finish_yn = 'S', update_time = now() where team_id not in(select team_id from team_member);
